titles.title: Electing Members, Delegates, and Resident Commissioners to certain standing committees of the House of Representatives.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 2/13/2003--Passed House without amendment. (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced in the House on February 13, 2003. The summary of that version is repeated here.)Elects Members, Delegates, and the Resident Commissioner to the following House standing Committees: (1) Agriculture; (2) Education and the Workforce; (3) Government Reform; (4) Science; (5) Small Business; and (6) Veterans' Affairs.
